title: About
text:
Hi, I’m Kalyan Bandaru, a data scientist with a keen interest in cybersecurity. With a background in computer science, I have worked as an Engineering Intern at BeyondSquareSolution pvt ltd and FireEye, where I have gained valuable experience in the field of cybersecurity. During my time at these companies, I had the opportunity to work on some exciting projects, including academic ones focused on networking and computer security. I was also the lead member on one of the projects I completed.
In addition to my work experience, I am familiar with programming languages such as C and Python, as well as web development tools such as HTML and CSS. I am always looking to expand my skillset and have actively participated in Pen Testing Workshops to improve my knowledge in this area.

title: Bandaru
text:
Hi, I’m Kalyan Bandaru, a data scientist with a keen interest in cybersecurity. With a background in computer science, I have worked as an Engineering Intern at BeyondSquareSolution pvt ltd and FireEye, where I have gained valuable experience in the field of cybersecurity. During my time at these companies, I had the opportunity to work on some exciting projects, including academic ones focused on networking and computer security. I was also the lead member on one of the projects I completed.
In addition to my work experience, I am familiar with programming languages such as C and Python, as well as web development tools such as HTML and CSS. I am always looking to expand my skillset and have actively participated in Pen Testing Workshops to improve my knowledge in this area.
As a team player, I work well in groups and am always willing to lend a helping hand to my colleagues. I am also capable of working independently and have a great sense of initiative when it comes to solving problems. Furthermore, I have excellent communication skills, which allow me to effectively convey ideas and work collaboratively with others.

title: Class Chat
text:
This is a post with news Class chat.
Description:
• Similar to WhatsApp, this is a chat on the server i.e., made up of two apps, which. Runs on the user’s browser and the server.
• To chat the user should connect with the server by the process of the login where they can do private and group chat.
• This application is intended to class or form department.

title: Data Communication
text:
This is a post with news on Data Communication.
Description:
• the aim of the project was about giving a brief demonstration how data transmission will be done on the internet in LAN and WAN using different primitives available in the OpenGL library and combining them together in a required manner.
• Implementation is done by OpenGL and Microsoft Visual C++

title: Drug Supply Chain Integrity
text:
This is a post with news on Drug supply chain integrity.
Description:
• Explored proof-of-concept application that keeps track of drug records using blockchain technology in a decentralized way
• Enables manufacturer, supplier, patients, and pharmacists to manage, access a complete individual drug life cycle in a secure and accountable way through comprehensive logs.
• To achieve the transparency, security, and privacy of the proposed system, we used a smartcontract developed in the solidity programming language in combination with permission blockchain architecture.

title: skills
text:
I have developed various skills during my professional practice. Some of the skills are:

Programming languages.e. C, Python.
Database tools.e.g MysQl, Django
Web development tools.e.g HTML, CSS and Javascript
Operating systems. e.g Wireshark, Nmap, Burp suite, Cisco Routing
&Switching.
Other tools/software. e.g MS Office (Word, Power Point, Excel)
